about_the_game:
Lost Kingdom: Idle War

Defend Your Kingdom from Endless Waves of Enemies!

The kingdom is under siege! In Lost Kingdom: Idle War, you must stand against relentless waves of enemies threatening to destroy your land. This thrilling idle RPG challenges you to command powerful heroes, unleash devastating abilities, and defend your realm against an ever-growing horde of foes.

Key Features:

⚔️ Idle Combat, Infinite Battles – Your heroes fight even while you're away! Upgrade their abilities, claim rewards, and grow stronger without constant grinding.

🔥 Powerful Heroes & Abilities – Unlock and upgrade legendary warriors, each with unique skills to turn the tide of battle.

🏹 Endless Enemy Waves – Face increasingly difficult waves of enemies, each deadlier than the last. How long can you survive?

🛡️ Strategic Defenses – Position your heroes wisely, manage resources, and use ultimate abilities at the perfect moment to crush the invaders.

💎 Upgrade & Dominate – Enhance your heroes, equip powerful gear, and unleash devastating attacks to push back the darkness.

The fate of the kingdom is in your hands! Rally your forces, fight back the hordes, and prove your strength.

Wishlist Now & Prepare for Battle!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2GB RAM MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4GB RAM MB RAM

name: Lost Kingdom: Idle War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.0 GHz
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Graphics: 2.0 GHz
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Defend your kingdom from relentless waves of enemies, Lost Kingdom: Idle War! Command powerful heroes, unleash devastating abilities, and survive the onslaught in this thrilling idle RPG. Wishlist now and get ready to embark on an epic idle war!
